# Ignore Java build files
*.class
*.war
*.jar

# Ignore logs and temp files
*.log
*.tmp

# Eclipse/IDE specific
.classpath
.project
.settings/

# OS-generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore database credentials (if any)
db.properties
*.env

# Ignore compiled output folders
build/
target/

# Tomcat work/cache files
work/
temp/
